targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(<time_column>) as time_sec,
  <value column> as value,
  <series name column> as metric
FROM <table name>
WHERE $__timeFilter(time_column)
ORDER BY <time_column> ASC

targets.expr: (histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(irate(istio_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket{reporter="destination",cluster=~"^$Account$"}[1m])) by (le, destination_workload)) / 1000) or histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(irate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{reporter="destination",cluster=~"^$Account$"}[1m])) by (le, destination_workload))

(histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(istio_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket{reporter="destination",cluster=~"^$Account$"}[$__range])) by (le, destination_workload, destination_workload_namespace)) / 1000) or histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{reporter="destination",cluster=~"^$Account$"}[$__range])) by (le, destination_workload, destination_workload_namespace))

(histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(istio_request_duration_milliseconds_bucket{reporter="destination",cluster=~"^$Account$"}[$__range])) by (le, destination_workload, destination_workload_namespace)) / 1000) or histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(istio_request_duration_seconds_bucket{reporter="destination",cluster=~"^$Account$"}[$__range])) by (le, destination_workload, destination_workload_namespace))
